topic.title: Zero ID 2.0
topic.body:
Hey I just want to tell you my idear for a ZeroID 2.0. Sadly i can not programm. And I am sorry for my bad english. 
So the Idear. Right now how I understand it zeronet generats a private key and a public key. 
When you use ZeroID a Zertifikate get signt with the private Key so the public key is linked to the zeroid.
If you want to login from a other pc you have to copy the files withe the privat key to the second computer.
My idear is to use two private keys.
the first one is the main key which is used to reset the second key in case it is compromised. 
The second key is the acutall key wich is used to proof that someone is the id owner. 
Is it possible to signe a file with the first key so that the public key from the second privat key authorized to represent a ZeroID? 
Because if yes you could crypt the public key with "synchron" cryptographie (not sure if that the name) with a password wich is rememberable. and that crypted file ist uploaded to  ZeroID 2.0.
So in theory if you want to login from a diffrent computer. You can tipe in your ZeroID and the password for the crypted private key. If some one steals or bruteforces the password for the login you have to change it with to signe a new file with a new second privat key.
